column4: Tesla adds new top and entry versions of Model S sedan
column5: DETROIT Tesla Motors Inc  plans to offer new versions of its battery-powered Model S sedan  including a $70 000 entry version and a top-of-the-line edition with longer range and better performance  the company said on Friday.

column4: UPDATE 2-Tesla adds new top and entry versions of Model S sedan
column5: DETROIT  July 17 Tesla Motors Inc plans to offer new versions of its battery-powered Model S sedan  including a $70 000 entry version and a top-of-the-line edition with longer range and better performance  the company said on Friday.
